title: Fiction
lyrics: Intro: Intro: [Em] [Bm]  [C] [G] [D] Ajik nan neol itji mothago Modeun geol da mitji motha go Ireohke neol bonaeji mothago oneuldo Amureohji anhge nege kiseu hago Dalkomhan neoui gyeoteul ddeonagajil motae Urin kkeut iraneun geon eobseo Ireohke nan d do (Fiction in Fiction) Itji mota go (Fiction in Fiction) Nae gaseum soge kkeut naji anheul iya gil sseugo isseo Neol butjabeulge (Fiction in Fiction) Nohji anheulge (Fiction in Fiction in Fiction) Kkeutnaji an heun neowa naui iyagi soge seo oneuldo in Ficti on. Igeum yeogin haengbokhan iyagildeulbakke eobseo Neomu haengbokhan uri dulman-ui iyagiga ireohke (hyeonsilgwaneun dareuge) sseo is seo jeomjeom chaeweojigo isseo Neoneun naegero dallyeowaseo anhgigo Pum anh-e angin neoreul naneun jeoldae nohji motae (motae, motae) Urin kkeut-iraneun geon eobseo Ireohke nan d do (Fiction in Fiction) Itji mota go (Fiction in Fiction) Nae gaseum soge kkeut naji anheul iya gil sseugo isseo Neol butjabeulge (Fiction in Fiction) Nohji anheulge (Fiction in Fiction in Fiction) Kkeutnaji an heun neowa naui iyagi soge seo oneuldo in Ficti on Dashi han beon deo malhajiman Jigeum neoneun nae yeop-e ittdago geureohke mitgo isseo nan hajiman Fiction namanui Fiction modu da Fiction modu da Fiction Jigeum nan neomunado haengbo khan saenggak-e iyagireul sseuji man Modeun ge baramil bbunira go yeojeonhi Nan haengobkhan geol (Fiction in Fiction in Fiction) Uri hamkke-in geol (Fiction in Fiction in Fiction) Ije shijak-in geol (Fiction in Fiction in Fiction) Kkeuteun eobtneun geol .... ol~ (Fiction in Fiction in Fiction).
